value.title: DAX, PostgreSQL and Cortana - Roundup #50

value.title: Hex Tile, DAX and narratives - Roundup #44
value.excerpt: Jason Thomas looks at how to create a Hex Tile Grid Map in Power BI. Bill Anton looks at how you can use DAX to accomplish a logical AND. Chris Webb uses DAX to create dynamic chart titles in Power BI. And, a new Power BI custom visual is available for natural language narratives.  Hex Tile Grid Maps

value.title: Roundup #30 (Service update, DAX in Report Builder, export and more)
value.excerpt: Catching up on the last two week. We had a big post regarding updates to the Power BI service. This included exporting data from a tile or report, adding images and textboxes, printing, connecting to SharePoint, pinning Excel charts, Power BI in Brazil and Hebrew/Arabic LTR support. value.title: Setting default values using COALESCE in DAX
value.excerpt: Learn how to get default values using the DAX COALESCE function instead of IF statements. A great way to avoid BLANK in Power BI!
